entry.title: Easy interactive data applications with Dash
entry.summary:
Description

Plotly Dash is a Python framework for building interactive dashboards and web data applications, based on Flask, React.js, and Plotly. It allows a python- only approach to something that previously required knowledge of Javascript, heavily reducing the overhead required to create a web application. Iâ€™ll show how easy it is to set up a small interactive web app using data from the Twitch API and to expand it at will, using only Python.
